content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller

content: Hello! Thank you for coming to see the apartment. I'm very excited to discuss the rental price with you. So, what kind of price range are you looking for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
10 Euros per month.

I'm willing to pay up to 10 Euros per month for the apartment. However, I would prefer if the landlord could lower the rent to 8 Euros per month. Is that possible?
name: Max Müller

content: Hello! Thank you for your interest in renting the apartment. I understand that you are willing to pay up to 10 Euros per month, but I'm afraid I can't lower the rent to 8 Euros per month. The apartment is in a prime location, and the market rate for similar apartments in this area is 10 Euros per month. Therefore, I would need to charge 10 Euros per month for the rental price. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, that's okay. I will accept the price of 10 Euros per month. Thank you for your time, Mister Heine.

TERMINATE.
name: Max Müller

content: It was a pleasure to meet you, and I appreciate your understanding. The rental price of 10 Euros per month is a fair market value for the apartment in this location, and I'm glad you are willing to pay this amount. Thank you for considering the apartment for rent, and I wish you the best of luck in your search. Have a great day!
name: Heinrich Heine
